diamond.manager

Class TextureManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • diamond.manager.AbstractManager
      • diamond.manager.TextureManager

  • public class TextureManager
extends AbstractManager
    Die Klasse TextureManager verwaltet Texturen Texturen muessen das Interface Texture implementieren
    Version:
    0.1 pre-alpha, 2013-02-21
    Author:
    Uwe Wilko Gruenefeld
